Package base

Class NeuralNetwork<O>

java.lang.Object
base.NeuralNetwork<O>
Type Parameters:
O - This generic is the type for the final output of the Neural Network.
public class NeuralNetwork<O>
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the base NeuralNetwork. It holds the computational layers, and the output layer.
See Also:
Layer, OutputLayer

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    NeuralNetwork()
    This constructor will instantiate the Neural Network with a name of Neural Network.

    This constructor will instantiate the Neural Network with a name.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addLayer​(Layer<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float>> layer)
    This method will add a new layer to the existing list of layers.

    This method will add all layers provided to the existing list of layers.
    O calc​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> input)
    This method will calculate the output of the Neural Network with it's current weights, given the input.
    java.util.ArrayList<O> calcAll​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float>> inputs)
    This method will calculate the outputs of all the inputs passed through the Neural Network.
    NeuralNetwork<O> clone()
    This method will create a deep copy of the current Neural Network.

    This method will replace the Neural Network's current computational layers with the layers provided.

      public void addLayers​(Layer<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float>>... layers)
      This method will add all layers provided to the existing list of layers.

      layers - This parameter is the list of layers provided to be added to the Neural Network's list of layers.

    • setOutputLayer

      public void setOutputLayer​(OutputLayer<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float>,​O> outputLayer)

      outputLayer - This parameter is the OutputLayer that will be set for the Neural Network.

    • setLayers

      public void setLayers​(java.util.ArrayList<Layer<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float>>> layers)
      This method will replace the Neural Network's current computational layers with the layers provided.
      Parameters:
      layers - This parameter will be the replacement to the old layers.

    • getLayers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Layer<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float>>> getLayers()

      List of layers.
      See Also:
      Layer

    • getNodes

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Node>> getNodes()
      This method will return a two dimensional list of nodes belonging to the Neural Network. Each nested list belongs to a separate layer within the Neural Network.
      Returns:
      2D List of Nodes
      See Also:
      Node

    • setNodes

      public void setNodes​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Node>> nodes)
      This method will replace the current two dimensional list of nodes with the one provided.
      Parameters:
      nodes - This parameter will be the new 2D list of nodes for the Neural Network.
      See Also:
      Node

    • calc

      public O calc​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float> input)
      This method will calculate the output of the Neural Network with it's current weights, given the input.
      Parameters:
      input - This parameter will be the input value for the Neural network's calculations.
      Returns:
      Expected Output from the Neural Network

    • calcAll

      public java.util.ArrayList<O> calcAll​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Float>> inputs)
      This method will calculate the outputs of all the inputs passed through the Neural Network.
      Parameters:
      inputs - This parameter will be the list of input values for the Neural Network's calculations.
      Returns:
      List of Expected Outputs from the Neural Network
